items.sentence: Don\'t cross the road while the signal is red.
I don\'t have as much money as I used to have.
I don\'t quite understand what you are saying.
Tom didn\'t tell me why he didn\'t want to go.
Tom said he hadn\'t seen Mary for a long time.
You never can tell what some people might buy.
You never know when an earthquake will happen.
I met Tom and Mary, as well as their families.
Tom said that he wasn\'t ready to get married.
Tom wondered why Mary hadn\'t texted him back.
